data.prayer: Father, help media producers communicate the gospel in a way that is understandable to the people of Ungheni, Moldova.
data.verse: But from there, you will seek the LORD your God, and you will find Him if you search for Him with all your heart and all your soul.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Ungheni, Moldova
data.section_summary: What people or resources could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Father, we pray for every movement leader and disciple in the state of Ungheni, Moldova that they would have deepening intimacy with you.
data.verse: On that day you will realize that I am in my Father, and you are in me, and I am in you.

data.section_summary: On average, 9 people will die without a personal relationship with Jesus in the next 100 hours in Ungheni, Moldova.
data.prayer: Jesus, send your gospel to these.
Father, send out evangelists who will challenge people like Peter who said, "Repent and be baptized, every one of you" in the state of Ungheni, Moldova.
data.verse: Peter replied, “Repent and be baptized, every one of you, in the name of Jesus Christ for the forgiveness of your sins. And you will receive the gift of the Holy Spirit.

data.prayer: Father, you gave the church of Ungheni, Moldova the greatest shepherd of all time, Jesus. Please, help them listen to him.
data.verse: I will place over them one shepherd, my servant David, and he will tend them; he will tend them and be their shepherd.

data.prayer: Spirit, protect the overcomers in Ungheni, Moldova, so that they will one day sit with Jesus on His throne.
data.verse: He who overcomes, I will give to him to sit down with me on my throne, as I also overcame, and sat down with my Father on his throne.

data.prayer: Lord, please make the same Spirit that raised Jesus from the dead give life to those who are called by his name in the state of Ungheni.
data.verse: But if the Spirit of him who raised up Jesus from the dead dwells in you, he who raised up Christ Jesus from the dead will also give life to your mortal bodies through his Spirit who dwells in you.

data.prayer: Father, bring yourself glory in Ungheni. Through your servants plant 20 new churches that love you, love one another, and make disciples this year.
data.verse: For the earth will be filled with the knowledge of the glory of the LORD as the waters cover the sea.
